columns.name: SiteID
columns.dc:description: The ID of the site. Can be any alphanumeric string including - and _

columns.name: Country
columns.dc:description: The Country that the site is in. Either given as name or (preferably) as URI (e.g. )

columns.name: Province
columns.dc:description: The sub-national administrative region (e.g. Province) that the site is in. Either given as Name or (preferably) as URI (e.g. )

columns.name: Locality
columns.dc:description: The nearest town or city of the site

columns.name: Latitude
columns.dc:description: A latitude in the WGS 84 standard coordinate system (see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System), specified as decimal number of degrees.

columns.name: Longitude
columns.dc:description: A longitude in the WGS 84 standard coordinate system (see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/World_Geodetic_System), specified as decimal number of degrees.
